Orenburg-Berdianca's marshmallow moved into the bush.

The carrier assures that none of the passengers were injured.
23 February18:05Comments

A man died in the fire in Orenburg.

The tragedy turned out last night, for residents of one of the streets of the regional center. The fire took a man's life.
23 February11:03Comments

For 13 years, an oranger was deprived of his liberty for trying to sell a drug shipment.

The District Court of Orenburg pronounced the sentence of a 31-year-old local resident.
22 February20:43Comments

The Court will decide whether to conduct a survey of the building technician in the Quarken District educational establishments

The Prosecutor ' s Office filed an application with the court, which requires a detailed and instructive survey of the technical status of the buildings in which children are located.
22 February15:48Comments

There was a fire at a furniture factory in Buzuluca.

105 staff were evacuated from the building.
22 February14:02video videoComments

In Orenburg, a drug-promoting teenager was detained.

The young man has broken the walls, placing them through the streets of drug advertising.
22 February12:34video videoComments

24 years had to be investigated to reveal who hit the death of the orchanin (18+)

The suspect was originally, but the man had an alibi.
22 February12:14Comments

Frozen stop: in the Red-Hard district, due to the parents' scandal, the child escaped from the house of the beans.

The girl is in the hospital.
22 February10:53Comments

In Buzuluca, the Lada Priora driver travelled to a woman

A woman is hospitalized with a serious fracture.
22 February10:41Comments

The roof of the school was partially affected by the " building structure "

The area of the damaged roof is provisionally estimated at 60 square metres.
22 February10:12Comments

In Quarken district, the roof was partially damaged at school

The children at the time of the collapse of the building, fortunately, were not.
22 February09:34Comments

A resident of Samara province seduced a teenage girl in Abdulino and surrendered to the police

A young man faces a long time and moral damage.
21 February17:29Comments

A policeman from the Sakmar district who beat his colleague directly in the department was placed in SIZO

The history of the fight in the Sakmar District Police Division between the two blusters of the law that took place in November last year has continued.
21 February15:59Comments

The court found Victor Bertholtz guilty of another murder, but the punishment remained the same (18+)

The Dzejin District Court of Orenburg pronounced a criminal conviction against Victor Bertholtz, serving life sentences for previous crimes.
21 February15:51video videoComments

A resident of Orenburg district paid a police officer for information on raids on migrants

The former Chief of the Migration Branch of the Police Division No. 7 of the Ministry of Internal Affairs of Russia ' s " Orenburg " , who " earned " more than 77,000 roubles " , will be followed by an entrepreneur who pays for important information.
21 February14:33Comments

A resident of Ijevska for an accident in Orenburzi may be deprived of his liberty

The road traffic accident occurred in the Ponomare district.
21 February13:10video videoComments

In the Krasnogvard district, the head of the village is detained for stealing funds

The verification materials are now referred to the investigating committee.
21 February09:38Comments

He fell asleep at the wheel: the culprit of a mass accident on the Orenburg-Orsk track was fined 5 to 1,000.

There were five cars. Fortunately, only one person was injured.
21 February07:13Comments

The resident of Orenburg received six years of colony for the fatal beating of the cohabitant (18+)

The Central District Court of the City hears criminal proceedings against a previously unconvicted local citizen accused of committing an offence under article 111, paragraph 4, of the Criminal Code of the Russian Federation, who intentionally inflicts serious harm on the health resulting in the death of the victim by negligence.
21 February06:25Comments

In Saraktash, the recidivist went into the house with Grandma and took the wallet open.

The man has been tried on several occasions: he is now awaiting another Femida verdict.
20 February20:13video videoComments

Cases

This section orenday is devotedAccidents, Tragedies, Disasters and Crimesrelevantin Orenburgand Orenburg.
We're following the accident reports and we're telling you the most.Importantand relevant ones.

Avia and car crashes, accidents

Transport events unfortunately occur in large quantitiesevery day♪ Orenday does not report a number of situations, such as " bats " on the road. Our task is to inform readers promptly of the events that need to be known.

11 FebruaryA plane collapsed in PodmoskovjeSaratov airlines with orchards on board. It was the Moskva Orsk flight.71 passengersand crew members are dead.

Landing accidentUrban Districttook seven lives.♪ 18-year-old Camille Kuvatov, like saving a guardian angel, losing her parents, she became a guardian of a younger sister.

Large scale

“Snow prisoners”In 2016, due to heavy metal in the snowOrenburg-OrskThere are dozens of cars. People who freeze in their cars waited more than 15 hours.

Crimes and penalties

We're tracking information on crimes and telling people who and for what he's done or he's gonna be punished, be it.gangs or killersof commissionedthe killing of entrepreneursin Orenburg

Of course, it's impossible to keep quiet about when the Ringers becomeGlobalMMM -Family Copier CooperativeI left hundreds of people without blood. By investing money on interest, many have copied for surgery, housing and other important needs.

Officials often have problems with the law. For example,criminal proceedingsnow former head of OrenburgEugenia ArapovaconvictedHead of Gennady Borisov♪TrialsThe Ministry of Education, the Ministry of Labour and Employment of the Orenburg Region, the Ministry of Agriculture of the Region, addressed them.

Search operations

We don't stay indifferent if the security forces or volunteers ask for help and help from the bandwidths.searching for people♪ Stillnot establishedlocationA serial maniac from Orsca Valeria Andreeva♪

Use of materials

All rights to be published on orenday are protected under the law of the Russian Federation. Any use of materials is permitted only in agreement with the Editor, with a mandatory active reference to the source.

The editorial is not responsible for the validity of advertisements posted on the website orenday.ru, the website content of the hyperlinks and the comments. Comments to the publications are personal views of the website users.
